snippet.title: Towers Deck Trailer
snippet.description:
Towers Deck is a mix of tower defense, deckbuilding and roguelike. Build tower, cast spells and build your deck to defend the castle from enemy hordes

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2261750/Towers_Deck/
